name: Ian Dury
description: '''Ian Robins Dury''' (12 May 1942{{snd}} 27 March 2000) was an English singer, songwriter and actor who rose to fame in the late 1970s, during the [[punk rock|punk]] and [[new wave music|new wave]] era of [[rock music]]. He was the lead singer and lyricist of [[Kilburn and the High Roads]], the Kilburns, [[The Blockheads|Ian Dury and the Blockheads]] and Ian Dury and the Music Students.
